comments: Creates a new role for an application. You must specify the id of the application you are creating the role for.
You can optionally specify an Id for the role inside the ApplicationRole object itself, if not provided one will be generated.

params.name: applicationId
comments: The Id of the application to create the role on.

params.name: roleId
comments: (Optional) The Id of the role. If not provided a secure random UUID will be generated.

params.name: request
comments: The request object that contains all of the information used to create the application role.
